globals.name: globals
globals.description: Temporary module that holds all the Perl global variables

Kollavarsham.name: Kollavarsham
Kollavarsham.description:
The Kollavarsham class implements all the public APIs of the library.

Create a new instance of this class, passing in the relevant options and call methods on this instance.

params.name: options
params.description: A set of key value pairs to configure the Kollavarsham instance. All settings are optional.

props.name: bija
props.description: Set this to true to use the Bija correction

props.name: latitude
props.description: Sets the latitude for the location for the conversions

props.name: longitude
props.description: Sets the longitude for the location for the conversions

props.name: outputformat
props.description: Set to 'list' or 'verbose' for the output

locations.name: locations
locations.type: {{Agra: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Ahmedabad: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Ajmer: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Aligarh: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Amritsar: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Bangalore: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Bhuvaneswar: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Bombay: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Calcutta: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Cochin: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Colombo: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Dacca: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Delhi: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Hyderabad: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Jaipur: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Kathmandu: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Lahor: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Madras: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Mathura: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Mysore: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Patna: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Pune: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Srinagar: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Trivandrum: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Varanasi: {latitude: number, longitude: number}, Ujjain: {latitude: number, longitude: number}}}

math.type: {{epsilon: number, radianInDegrees: number, floatingPointEqual: floatingPointEqual, isNumber: isNumber, isInt: isInt, truncateDecimals: truncateDecimals, truncate: truncate, floor: floor, fractional: fractional, round: round, square: square}}

classitems.description: Prints the opening message/banner when the CLI is invoked
classitems.name: openingMessage

classitems.description: Displays the help message for the CLI
classitems.name: helpMessage

classitems.description: Shows the latitude values for various Indian cities on the map - legacy from Perl
classitems.name: showLatitudes

classitems.description: Shows the longitude values for various Indian cities on the map - legacy from Perl
classitems.name: showLongitudes

params.name: date
params.description: String representation of the date to be parsed

classitems.description: Pads zeroes to print the date in a pretty format
Converts the Julian Date to a nicely formatted string with year, month and date
classitems.name: toString

classitems.description: Converts the Kollavarsham Date to a nicely formatted string with year, month and date
classitems.name: toString

classitems.type: {{planet: boolean, YugaCivilDays: boolean, YugaSynodicMonth: boolean, YugaAdhimasa: boolean, YugaTithi: boolean, YugaKsayadina: boolean, lagna: boolean, back_clong_ahar: number, back_nclong_ahar: number, back_clong: number, back_nclong: number, year: boolean, month: boolean, paksa: boolean, day: boolean, ahar: boolean, ahargana: boolean, hours: boolean, minutes: boolean, JulianDay: boolean, YearKali: boolean, YearSaka: boolean, YearVikrama: boolean, masa_num: boolean, saura_masa_num: boolean, saura_masa_day: boolean, tithi_day: boolean, mslong: boolean, tslong: boolean, mllong: boolean, tllong: boolean, clong: boolean, nclong: boolean, tithi: boolean, ftithi: boolean, eqtime: boolean, sriseh: boolean, srisem: boolean, weekday_name: boolean, sukla_krsna: boolean, adhimasa: boolean, masa: boolean, naksatra: boolean, samkranti: boolean, samkranti_year: boolean, samkranti_month: boolean, samkranti_day: boolean, samkranti_hour: boolean, samkranti_min: boolean, ayanadeg: boolean, ayanamin: boolean, desantara: number, counter: boolean}}

classitems.description: Holds the settings state of the Kollavarsham instance. To access a snapshot use the {{#crossLink "Kollavarsham/getSettings:method"}}{{/crossLink}} method
classitems.name: _settings

classitems.description: Gets a snapshot of the current settings
classitems.name: getSettings

return.description: The current snapshot of the settings/configuration

classitems.description: Sets the mode of conversion - from Gregorian to Malayalam Era or vice versa. `0`and `1` (any non-zero value is considered as 1) are valid values
classitems.name: setMode

params.name: mode
params.description: A value of `0` will do Gregorian to Malayalam Era and a value of `1` (or any non-zero value) will do Malayalam Era date to Gregorian

classitems.description: Sets or unsets the Bija factor
classitems.name: setBija

classitems.description: Sets the latitude for the location that will be used as the basis for the conversion
classitems.name: setLatitude

classitems.description: Sets the longitude for the location that will be used as the basis of the conversion
classitems.name: setLongitude

classitems.description: Sets the output to be as 'list' or 'verbose'
classitems.name: setOutput

classitems.description: Sets the input Gregorian date for conversion
classitems.name: setInputDate

classitems.description: Converts a Gregorian date to the equivalent Kollavarsham date, respecting the current configuration
classitems.name: fromGregorianDate

params.name: date
params.description: The Gregorian date to be converted to Kollavarsham
